content: Since jumped into crypto space in 2018, ZMQ worked as designated market maker (DMM) for 50+ Exchanges and 200+ issued coins/tokens. Our HFT MM strategies and trading bots power $1~3bn in daily volume for more than 1000 trading pairs, including spot and derivatives.We're open to cooperate with you!Contact me viaTelegram: Annokay1Twitter: Ann202011Email: ann@zmquant.comOur professional services and solutions:Market MakingZMQ provides professional digital assets market making service for token projects and exchanges uses sophisticated trading algorithms that automatically quote prices on both the buy and the sell side of the order book.Assets: High liquid assets and illiquid new assets.Support platforms:CEXs & DEXsAssets managementZMQ provides asset management service for HNWIs, MOM, FOF, Family offices, VC Funds, token projects on different exchanges worldwide. Our team is full of financial experience to build comprehensive models to efficiently extract alpha in the digital asset yield curve. Products: Programable Execution Services, Crypto hedging, crypto statistical arbitrage, Crypto Market-Neutral.Clients: MOM, FOF, Family offices, VC Funds, token projects, etc.Portfolio investmentWe invest from some early-stage to full maturity projects in both primary and secondary markets to help startups grow.Startups: Web3, Layer1/2, DeFi, NFT, GameFi, DAO, etc.AdvisoryZMQ team members have entered in blockchain industry in 2016, with deep acknowledge in tokenomic, blockchain technology, quant analyst, and full experience for the secondary market, we' ll give you practical go-to-market strategy and help you grow.What we do: Tokenomic, secondary market strategies, exchange listing, etc.Clients: Startups.If you have any projects to refer, we will provide commission revenue for that too!
